# haproxy_global (Data Source)



## Example Usage

```terraform
data "haproxy_global" "global" {
    name = "global"
    depends_on = [ haproxy_global.global ]
}
```

## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String) The name of the Global. It must be unique and cannot be changed.

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.
